com.upsight.android.marketing

Interface UpsightBillboard.Handler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpsightBillboardHandlers.DefaultHandler, UpsightBillboardHandlers.DialogHandler, UpsightBillboardHandlers.FullscreenHandler
    Enclosing class:
    UpsightBillboard

    public static interface UpsightBillboard.Handler
    The interface that must be implemented to handle callbacks associated with an UpsightBillboard.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters onAttach(java.lang.String scope)
      Called when marketing content becomes available.
      void onDetach()
      Called when marketing content is detached from the UpsightBillboard.
      void onNextView()
      For marketing content composed of multiple views, this method is called before each view transition.
      void onPurchases(java.util.List<UpsightPurchase> purchases)
      Called if virtual goods to be purchased are pushed through the marketing content.
      void onRewards(java.util.List<UpsightReward> rewards)
      Called if virtual goods to be rewarded are pushed through the marketing content.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters onAttach(java.lang.String scope)
        Called when marketing content becomes available. Return an UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance to show the content, or null to skip. In the latter case, this method will be called again when new eligible content becomes available, until the UpsightBillboard is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        scope - The scope associated with the UpsightBillboard.
        Returns:
        Parameters for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard. Return null to skip this piece of marketing content without displaying anything.

      • onNextView

        void onNextView()
        For marketing content composed of multiple views, this method is called before each view transition. This is not called before the first view is shown as the view transition is preceded by onAttach(String).

      • onDetach

        void onDetach()
        Called when marketing content is detached from the UpsightBillboard. This is called only once, after the final view is detached and the billboard is unregistered. The dismiss may be user-triggered or resulting from an internal timeout. In either case, the billboard is internally unregistered and UpsightBillboard.destroy() need not be called.

      • onPurchases

        void onPurchases(java.util.List<UpsightPurchase> purchases)
        Called if virtual goods to be purchased are pushed through the marketing content.
        Parameters:
        purchases - The list of UpsightPurchase.

      • onRewards

        void onRewards(java.util.List<UpsightReward> rewards)
        Called if virtual goods to be rewarded are pushed through the marketing content.
        Parameters:
        rewards - The list of UpsightReward.
